WorkItem.Description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the "Item Editor..." window. (By the way, why is there an ellipsis in the window title?)
2. Select any item that has no duplicates from the item list.
3. Click the "Delete Duplicates" button.
4. When the "Confirm Delete Duplicates" dialog appears, click "Yes" to delete all instances of the item except the selected one.
Result: The selected item is itself deleted from the item list, contrary to the expectations given by the confirmation dialog.
Â 
Note: "Delete Duplicates" appears to function correctly when there are in fact additional instances of the selected item in the list.
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Delete Duplicates deletes selection if there are no duplicates

Comments.Message: Good catch, will get that fixed for b14.1. Thanks!
